title: Authentication
text: susoapi package offers better solution addresses problems simultaneously. Rather provide authentication separately function, set_credentials() captures authentication , provides function, store sensitive details somewhere safe. Contrast code code : set_credentials() function captures authentication makes available two secure places. current session, function loads parameters R environment variables: SUSO_SERVER server address, SUSO_WORKSPACE server workspace, SUSO_USER API user name, SUSO_PASSWORD API user password. future sessions, function writes credentials .Renviron loaded credentials upon session startup. susoapi functions communicate server load source values R environment variables. example, see default arguments get_questionnaires: allows function users set credentials use several times without effort.
code: # first, set credentials for connecting with the server set_credentials(   server = "https://example.server",   workspace = "myworkspace",   user = "My_API_user1",   password = "MySecretPassword2Day" )  # then, get all questionnaires get_questionnaires()  # next, active audio capture for a questionnaire set_questionnaire_audio(   qnr_id = "72f7160c-12dc-4dd4-9df1-66af819e434d",   qnr_version = 1 ) get_questionnaires(   server = Sys.getenv("SUSO_SERVER"),   workspace = Sys.getenv("SUSO_WORKSPACE"),   user = Sys.getenv("SUSO_USER"),   password = Sys.getenv("SUSO_PASSWORD") )

title: Exporting
text: Survey Solutions’s user interface, exporting involves sequential steps: Select template Select version template Specify status interviews export (default: ) Data type: microdata paradata Whether include questionnaire paradata Data export format: tab-separated, Stata, SPSS Click ADD QUEUE Cick DOWNLOAD export files available

title: Exporting
text: Via API, steps similar different: Submit export job Check whether job complete Download file job complete

title: Exporting
text: susoapi, translates following sequence function calls. First, start export job, specifying particulars: , check job’s status: Repeat job status queries job complete. Next, download file produced completed job: Alternatively, see susoflows functions automate similar export worflows.
code: # set server authentication credentials set_credentials(   server = "https://exampleserver.com",   workspace = "myworkspace",   user = "My_API_user10",   password = "MySecretPassword2Day123" )  # start an export job # specifying same same options as in user interface # optionally specifying other options--including some not available in the UI start_export(   qnr_id = "72f7160c-12dc-4dd4-9df1-66af819e434d$1",   export_type = "STATA",   interview_status = "All",   include_meta = TRUE ) -> started_job_id # check export job progess, # specifying ID of job started in prior step get_export_job_details(job_id = started_job_id) # download the export file,  # specifying: # - job ID # - where to download the file get_export_file(     job_id = started_job_id,     path = "C:/your/file/path/" )

title: susoapi 0.2.1
text: Fix bug requests failed server URL terminal /. Allow user check credentials provided arguments check_credentials() rather entries .Renviron. allows checking credentials without setting . check_credentials() function still defaults environment variable values credentials arguments provided function arguments. Update tests test fixtures Survey Solutions 24.06.1

title: susoapi 0.2.0
text: Credentials now include workspace. set_credentials() now workspace argument. functions target workspaces now draw credentials (#24, #26, h/t @ashwinikalantri). Interview attributes can now user-specified. nodes argument get_interviews(), users may specify many nodes information interviews needed. nothing specified, default fetch nodes. something specified, must include id may include things (#23).

title: susoapi 0.2.0
text: Credentials used functions now expect workspace. Users need use set_credentials() add component .Renviron file.

title: susoapi 0.2.0
text: Fixed help pages documentation suggested logical values provided strings rather logical values code required (#25, h/t @ashwinikalantri). Fixed issue failure specify qnr_version get_assignments() lead function returning assignments questionnaires (#27, h/t @ashwinikalantri). Added checks arguments throughout–typically logical values, user names, dates time intervals–tests ensure checks work correctly. Convert NA_character_ comments empty strings forming request interview functions. Added private function is_user_name() check whether user-provided user names followed Survey Solutions rules character length content. Revised order arguments documentation credentials: server, workspace, user, password.

title: susoapi 0.1.3
text: Fix check_credentials(). Check credentials getting API user’s details rather fetching workspaces user access. former requires simple API access workspace. latter requires admin API access.

title: susoapi 0.1.2
text: Fix set_credentials(). Better managment pre-existing .Renviron files. Previously, function delete several key-value pairs .Renviron adding/updating Survey Solutions entries. Now, function preserves prior key-value entries. Also, tests added check function works correctly going forward. huge thanks @petbrueck spotting suggesting fix (#20). Revise check_workspace_param(), private function used check API user access user-specified workspace, work better API user access one workspace. Previously, function fetched workspaces user access. worked API user admin rights access workspace endpoints. Now, function checks whether API user access target workspace fetching user details workspace.

title: susoapi 0.1.1
text: Fix get_interviewers(). private function missing workspaces argument. (h/t @ashwinikalantri)

title: susoapi 0.1.0
text: Scope functions workspaces. workspace specified, function take "primary" default value. workspace specified, function attempt execute within designated workspace. function yield result user authorized access workspace. function fails, indicate target workspace invalid/inaccessible say workspaces user credentials can access. pre-empt function failure, user can also use check_credentials() specify target workspace. Re-implement several functions GraphQL API, REST endpoint either deprecated less good solution GraphQL. include: get_questionnaires, get_interviews_for_questionnaire, get_interviews. Minor fixes
